member.name: T:MindFusion.Reporting.Wpf.Report
member.summary: Represents a report, which can be previewed, printed or exported.
member.remarks: You can create new reports by instantiating from this class. New pages can be added to the report by creating Page objects and adding them to the collection returned by the report's Pages property. Report items are added to the Report by adding them to one of the pages contained in the report.
